reasons_to_visit.details: February offers the most authentic local experience with minimal tourist crowds at major attractions.
Prague's romantic architecture and intimate restaurants make it perfect for couples celebrating Valentine's Day.
Winter cultural season continues with classical concerts, opera, and theater performances.
Lowest accommodation and dining prices of the year, making luxury experiences more affordable.

reasons_to_avoid.details: February can be the coldest month with potential for snow and ice, limiting outdoor activities.
Overcast skies and limited sunshine can create a somber atmosphere for some visitors.
